Title: Native integration for OpenAI Agents SDK
introduction:
We worked with OpenAIto build a native integration for the OpenAI Agents SDK. Today, we are very excited to launch as a tracing processor. 

 With just a few lines of code, you can trace all your agent workflows and debug them much faster. Check out the [quick demo here](https://x.com/keywordsai/status/1903197075241869409).

New.description: Added [Linkup integration](https://docs.keywordsai.co/integration/dev-tools/linkup) to incorporate search capabilities in LLM calls.
Enabled control over API key rate limits via API payloads.
You can now use API to [CRUD your API keys](https://docs.keywordsai.co/api-endpoints/temporary-api-keys/create-temporary-key) and do API key management.
Allowed logs to be attached directly to existing or new experiments.

Improved.description: Improved the UI for traces, making them easier to read and debug.

Fixed.description: Fixed a bug where the token count for Anthropic Claude Haiku was miscalculated
Fixed a bug where API key usage limits in the UI were not functioning correctly.
Fixed a bug where tool calls in Compare mode were not working.
